meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Chastity</kanji> is always in <kanji>season</kanji> so it's always cool to try to keep your <vocabulary>chastity</vocabulary>. Spring, summer? Doesn't matter. Your decision to stay that way is fine no matter what time of year it is.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
